function_call.name: classify_risks_PESTLE
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"The potential spread of contagious diseases through touch-based interfaces and remote human interaction technologies","category":"Poor access to Diagnostics and Treatment","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Transmission of contagious diseases through physical contact with actuator technology.","category":"Failure to implement preventive measures","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Transmission of contagious diseases through mid-air tactile enabling technologies","category":"Failure to implement preventive measures","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Virtual worlds and online shops with avatars could increase the risk of contagious diseases propagation due to the close interaction of people in virtual spaces","category":"Lack of access to health services","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Increased risk of contagion due to physical proximity in virtual reality shopping false sense of security regarding disease transmission","category":"Misinterpretation of data and results","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Integration of voice assistant technology in cooking
